Text.Page:
These cultists aren't giving up! We'll need to eliminate all of them!

Start with the {@LinkCreature:25#2061#devan vanguards} and {@LinkCreature:25#2081#caiman scavengers}. They may not look tough, but they're definitely troublesome.
That's a good-sized dent in their numbers. Sometimes I wonder if we'll ever have an assignment that ISN'T killing cultists.
